div.p: ( a) Ultraviolet–visible light (UV–Vis) absorption and photoluminescence (PL) spectra of NM-CQDs dispersed in formamide. The insets show the photographs of NM-CQDs under a room light and a UV light source (λ = 365 nm). ( b) PL spectra of NM-CQDs excited with different excitation wavelengths. ( c) PL emission of NM-CQDs excited at 390 nm measured from the first to the ninth day. ( d) PL decay profiles of NM-CQDs with two emission wavelengths of 447 nm (violet squares) and 476 nm (blue circles).
